name: Melega
description: Melega (Marco) is the flagship utility token of melega.finance, the new AMM DEX on Binance Smart Chain (BSC) providing friendly trading and better project support. A total black design, an original name, a distinctive and recognizable logo are the symbol of a project that intends to differentiate itself from the other amm dex by focusing more on the promotion of new gems than on consolidated projects with always new and innovative services.
